name: Virtual Strangers
description:
mikeharris.design/virtual-strangers Virtual Strangers puts two complete strangers, from anywhere in the world, into a shared virtual space and gives them the ability to talk to each other, create drawings together, and scale them up to mind-bending proportions, all using the most natural and intuitive instruments humans have, their own hands. Requires Oculus Rift + Leap Motion

Download for Free Below (donations optional)
